home.welcome_text: You can rank sentence examples with the following tools ...

auth.signup_cta: Please register with email and password.
auth.recover_cta: Request a new password for your Email.
auth.google_signin_cookie_warning: The Google SignIn Button will only work if 3rd party Cookies are enabled in your browser.

legal.consent_information: In the app, the preferences, decisions and usage behavior of the users are recorded, but data is only sent to the server, stored, processed, and published if the user has granted a CC0 license to the data generated by him.
legal.consent_confirmation: I hereby grant a CC0 license on all data generated by me using the Web App (evaluation data, model data und demographic data).

bestworst.title: Best Worst Scaling
bestworst.help_short: Select the best and worst out of four examples
bestworst.help_long: 4 sentence examples are displayed. First mark the best sentence example. Finally, select the worst sentence example.

variation.title: Sentence Variations
variation.help_long: Search for sentence examples for a keyword and filter how much the sentences should differ semantically, syntactically, at character level and in terms of the source information.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.menu_description: Data protection information for research projects

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.menu_description: The general terms of using this application

consent.title: Informed Consent
consent.menu_description: Do you agree to share and publish your data?

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.menu_description: Who is responsible for the content?
